DensityOfHO2P[EUVI_,SZA_,theta_,z_]:=(2.2807996333029754*Sec[Degree*SZA]^0.04966024882282019*(1 + 0.46076128027101476*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]])*EUVI^0.3141935757527569)/E^((-300 + z)/(90.11712691740894 - 1.8836118730871652*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 23.180413166580873*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 13.600511104216084*EUVI + ((99.56822356164744 - 1.0711473045525375*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 36.2881609432798*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 23.510535324105927*EUVI)*(-300 + z))/300))
